backend/main.mo: Actor defines user profiles, network data, transmissions, and authorization checks with persistent storage using Map and List structures.
feature_evidence.json: Report listing two CSS-related features, their affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like collection of short descriptions for various frontend files summarizing their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus OKLCH variable definitions for light/dark themes and global background/foreground setup.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the root div and loading the frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, authentication handling, and root layout with optional profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Top-level UI layout with header, footer, responsive navigation, and consistent dark background.
Displays a segmented audio level meter driven by Web Audio API readings with color‑coded segments.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Route guard that blocks access when unauthenticated and shows a login prompt card.
frontend/src/components/ColorAccentPanel: Neutral dark-themed panel component providing a subtle bordered container without bright accents.
Renders a styled page header with optional icon, title, and subtitle based on variant. Provides a simple card-style layout.
frontend/src/components/DirectoryBrowser: Displays and filters a list of digital voice networks with search, mode tabs, favorites, and talkgroup selection. Handles network selection and favorite toggling.
frontend/src/components/IaxDvswitchConne: Form to configure and save IAX/DVSwitch gateway connection details, then navigate to the PTT page. Supports optional username, password, port, and node number.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading state handling and automatic re-authentication fallback. Clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/NowHearingList.t: Shows recent transmissions or placeholders when empty or loading. Each entry displays callsign, network, talkgroup, and timestamp.
frontend/src/components/PersonalDirector: Manages locally stored custom directory entries with add, list, and delete capabilities. Persists entries in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Always-open dialog prompting the user to submit callsign, name, and license acknowledgement. Validates input and saves the profile via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/PttControl.tsx: Push‑to‑talk button handling press/hold interactions and transmit state visuals. Calls optional callbacks on transmit start and stop and supports disabled state.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeStatusBa: Shows connection, transmit, and receive status badges along with the room label.
frontend/src/components/TransmitDisclaim: Displays a warning alert requiring users to acknowledge a valid amateur radio license before using voice features.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioLevelMeter.ts: Tracks live microphone audio levels using Web Audio API and reports activity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile via backend actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Retrieves and toggles the user's favorite networks using backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication, login state, and persistent identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicPttRecorder.ts: Handles PTT-style microphone recording with error handling and blob output.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworks.ts: Fetches builtin networks and performs client‑side search filtering.
frontend/src/hooks/useNowHearing.ts: Queries and updates the current list of active transmissions with periodic polling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferredConnectio: Saves, loads, and identifies persisted connection configurations including legacy and IAX/DVSwitch formats.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrzLookup.ts: Runs QRZ callsign lookups through the backend when supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Fetches the caller's user role and admin status from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebRtcPtt.ts: React hook managing WebRTC push-to-talk state, peer connection setup, signaling, audio tracks, and cleanup for a given room.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions using OKLCH colors and custom utilities for a radio-inspired dark UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutCompliancePage.t: Page explaining what PTTStar is and outlining licensing, DMR ID requirements, and compliance notices.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityPage.tsx: Displays live transmission activity with auto-updating feed and manual refresh.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: UI for configuring or clearing IAX/DVSwitch connection settings using tabs.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Provides network browsing and personal directory entry management via tabbed interface.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with app intro, login or connect actions, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/PttPage.tsx: Push-to-talk page that loads the preferred connection, joins a WebRTC room, manages transmit/receive state, handles mic recording fallback, and displays connection or permission errors.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: User settings page allowing callsign, name, and license acknowledgment updates with QRZ lookup integration and profile save/validation handling.
frontend/src/utils/roomKey.ts: Utilities that derive a stable room key and human-readable label from the current connection type and settings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
